items.content_html: Shock horror I am hoping to get another Procter Periodical out in the next couple of weeks. Spurred on by 3 Ko-fi donations last month I am going for it! Sign up here. periodical.adamprocter.co.uk

items.title: Empowering humans
items.content_html: As we move towards the inevitably automated world. We must focus on what makes us human. Let the robots be robots. What we have that they can never have, we have the ability to be creative. As educators we need to teach humans to be creative. Let the Tesco‚Äôs and Amazon robots and drones package and deliver our goods, but let‚Äôs empower the humans first.
